Section.Label: Chapter_UnitalSZ_automatic_generated_documentation_Section_UnitalSZ_automatic_generated_documentation_of_global_functions
Section.Heading: UnitalSZ automatic generated documentation of global functions

ManSection.Returns: The classical unital object, which is the abstract unital of order q isomorphic to the Hermitian curve in the classical projective plane.
ManSection.Description: The Hermitian curve has the following canonical equation: X_0^{q + 1} + X_1^{q + 1} + X_2^{q + 1} = 0. The function computes the blocks of the unital with the help of PGU(3,q) and calls AbstractUnitalByDesignBlocks. The Name of the unital is set as HermitianAbstractUnital(q).
